subject: Mountain Climbing
Transplants
National Parks, Monuments and Seashores
lead_paragraph: The heart transplant survivor Kelly Perkins has added another first to her long string of mountaineering feats since getting a new heart 13 years ago — a dangerous climb up a sheer, 2,000-foot face of Half Dome, Yosemite National Park’s famed granite monolith.
